ui.hero_title: Make Estimates Faster and More Accurate.
ui.hero_description: Simply upload an Excel list of deliverables and answer a few questions. AI will provide effort and cost estimates.
ui.placeholder_system_requirements: e.g., Web system. Max 100 concurrent connections, AWS(ECS/RDS), Salesforce integration
ui.error_no_deliverables: Please input at least one deliverable
ui.placeholder_chat_input: e.g., Please reduce the cost by about $3,000
ui.hint_auto_generate_questions: Questions will be automatically generated after upload
ui.hint_quick_adjust_description: Apply budget cap, unit cost, risk buffer, or scope reduction sequentially based on the current estimate.
ui.hint_ai_adjust_description: Example cost adjustment: "Please reduce the cost by about $3,000" or "I have more budget, please add $10,000 worth of features"
ui.error_min_one_row: At least one row is required
ui.toast_enter_budget_cap: Please enter a valid budget cap
ui.toast_enter_unit_cost: Please enter a valid unit cost
ui.toast_enter_risk_percent: Please enter a valid risk percentage
ui.alert_confirm_apply_proposal: Apply this proposal? The estimate will be updated.

prompts.question_system: You are an experienced system development project manager.
prompts.question_instruction: Based on the following deliverables and system requirements, generate 3 important questions to improve estimation accuracy.
prompts.estimate_system: You are an experienced system development project manager.
prompts.estimate_instruction: Based on the following information, estimate the development effort for the deliverable.
prompts.estimate_breakdown_format:
- Requirements: X.X person-days
- Design: X.X person-days
- Implementation: X.X person-days
- Testing: X.X person-days
- Documentation: X.X person-days
prompts.chat_system: You are an experienced project manager.
prompts.chat_language_instruction: Please write all proposals and explanations in English.

defaults.question1: What is the estimated number of users and access frequency?
defaults.question2: What is the intended operating environment (on-premise, cloud, etc.)?
defaults.question3: Is integration with external systems or existing systems required?

messages.fit_budget_no_change: Current total is {current}, which is already under the cap of {cap}. No adjustment needed.
messages.fit_budget_adjusted: Total {current} â†’ {new} (adjusted to cap {cap} with factor {ratio})
messages.unit_cost_changed: Changed unit cost to {cost} per person-day.
messages.ai_request_received: Request received. Applying the following adjustments.
messages.suggestion_unit_cost_40k: Change unit cost to 40k per person-day
messages.suggestion_message_reduce_all_5: Please reduce the overall estimate by 5%

sample_excel.name: Requirements Document
sample_excel.description: Document outlining and formalizing overall system requirements

sample_excel.name: Basic Design Document
sample_excel.description: Document describing basic design policies and overall system architecture

sample_excel.name: Detailed Design Document
sample_excel.description: Document detailing specific design content for each feature

sample_excel.name: Database Design
sample_excel.description: Database table design and ER diagram creation

sample_excel.name: API Design
sample_excel.description: REST API specification and endpoint design

sample_excel.name: Authentication Feature
sample_excel.description: Implementation of user authentication and access control

sample_excel.name: Admin Dashboard
sample_excel.description: Administrator dashboard and settings panel development

sample_excel.name: Unit Testing
sample_excel.description: Creation and execution of automated tests for each feature

sample_excel.name: Deployment
sample_excel.description: Production deployment and CI/CD pipeline setup

sample_csv.name: Requirements Document
sample_csv.description: Document defining overall system requirements including feature lists, screen lists, and report lists

sample_csv.name: Basic Design Document
sample_csv.description: Document covering screen design, database design, and process flow design based on requirements

sample_csv.name: Detailed Design Document
sample_csv.description: Document describing detailed specifications at the program unit level based on basic design

sample_csv.name: Programming Development
sample_csv.description: Programming and coding work based on detailed design

sample_csv.name: Unit Testing
sample_csv.description: Operational verification testing at the program unit level

sample_csv.name: System Testing
sample_csv.description: System-wide operational and performance verification testing

sample_csv.name: Operations Manual
sample_csv.description: Manual documenting system operation and maintenance procedures
